attributes.additional_details:
You need a licence to hold a Bat or a Snake, film a bird on it's nest but you can chop down the trees and hedgerow in a Bats feeding run or burn the grass where a Snake lives. 

Old Barn's can be converted or pulled down destroying nesting sites which have been in use for countless generations by Swallows etc-

A 1000 year old site in Bolton has a 11 Specie of birds on the Red List and 15 on the Amber list this does not include animal, insect, fish, trees or plant life. Passed for Building
attributes.background:
92% of all Britain's wild life has no habitat protection. 46% of S.S.S.I in the past 6 years have never been checked.

 Up to now no government body has ever checked to see if the Translocationj of a specie has been successful.

G.B. has 70,000 species, 7,000 are in serious trouble.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about habitat protection, but it's not clear what you want the Government to do about this.

You could start a new petition stating how you want the Government to protect habitats, such as by increasing funding for this purpose, or changing the rules relating to habitat protection.
